categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic units

nodes.text: Devil Dogs was a unit of clone troopers within the 44th Special Operations Division. During the Clone Wars, they served under the command of Major Kendal Ozzel where they found themselves sent on highly dangerous combat missions.

During the Battle of Khorm, the Devil Dogs were assigned to aid Jedi Masters Plo Koon and Kit Fisto to destroy a Separatist climate-control station. When they stopped to bury a group of dead Khormai at Adaroo's request, they chose to help with the burial detail, feeling that by finishing the burial quickly, they could get back to the mission at hand.
